headline: IFF Adds Real-Time Consumer Feedback into Fragrance Creation with Introduction of AI-Powered ScentChat™ App
summary: IFF (NYSE: IFF) announces the launch of its new AI-powered research tool, ScentChat™, an instant messaging application designed to enhance the fragrance creation process with the addition of real-time consumer feedback, coupled with qualitative insights. The app connects directly with leading messaging platforms, bridging the gap between consumers and IFF creatives to unlock co-creation opportunities. Using advanced semantic AI and Natural Language Processing (NLP), ScentChat™ provides valuable
